member.name: P:Xamarin.Controls.SignaturePadView.SignatureLine
member.summary: Gets the horizontal line that goes in the lower part of the pad.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Controls.SignaturePadView.Caption
member.summary: The caption displayed under the signature line.

member.name: P:Xamarin.Controls.SignaturePadView.SignaturePrompt
member.summary: The prompt displayed at the beginning of the signature line.

member.summary: Gets the label that clears the pad when clicked.

member.summary: Gets the image view that may be used as a watermark or as a texture for the signature pad.

member.name: M:Xamarin.Controls.PathSmoothing.SmoothedPathWithGranularity(Xamarin.Controls.InkStroke,System.Int32)
member.summary: Obtain a smoothed path with the specified granularity from the current path using Catmull-Rom spline. Also outputs a List of the points corresponding to the smoothed path.
member.remarks: Implemented using a modified version of the code in the solution at http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8702696/drawing-smooth-curves-methods-needed
